Chief Jimoh Buraimoh (amụrụ n'afọ 1943, dị ka Jimoh Adetunji Buraimoh ) bụ onye eserese Naijiria na onye na-ese ihe.
Chief Buraimoh bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị nwee mmetụta nke pụtara site na ọmụmụ ihe nke Ulli Beier na Georgina Beier duziri na Osogbo, Osun State, Nigeria
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma ama site na Osogbo.
A mụrụ Jimoh Buraimoh na Osogbo, Osun State, Nigeria, n'afọ 1943 n'ime alaka ndị Alakụba nke ezinụlọ eze nke obodo ahụ
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe nke afọ 1960 nke Ulli Beier duziri, ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ọkụ n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Duro Ladipo.
Ọrụ Jimoh Buraimoh jikọtara mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ na ụdị Yoruba

A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye isi mbụ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mgbe, n'afọ 1964, o mere ụdị nka nke oge a sitere na ọdịnala ndị Yoruba nke itinye ihe eji emepụta ihe n'ime ákwà emume na okpueze e ji bead wee mepụta. N'afọ 1972, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na First All African Trade Fair na Nairobi, Kenya
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ihe osise ya a ma ama na World Festival of Black Arts, Festac '77
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria mbụ e mere onye otu na Contemporary World Association of Mosaic Artists
E gosipụtala ọrụ Jimoh Buraimoh ma n'ụlọ ma na mba ofesi.
Jimoh Buraimoh bụkwa onye na-ese ihe nke ọma
N'afọ 1974, ọ kụziri na Haystack Mountain School of Crafts na Maine
Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum Bloomington na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na New York, Boston na Los Angeles.
